data.meta_description: Joseph Edward Cassidy Jr (74) of Trainer Pa, passed away on August 18th, 2021 at Riddle Memorial Hospital.
data.text:
August 20th, 2021

Joseph Edward Cassidy Jr (74) of Trainer Pa, passed away on August 18th, 2021 at Riddle Memorial Hospital.

Joe was born in Chester PA.

He graduated from St James High School in 1965.

After he graduated Joe joined the United States Navy so he could follow in his father’s footsteps and proudly served from 1965-1969. While serving as a Radioman 3rd Class on the USS Annapolis and the USS Coral Sea traveling to many places he receiving the following medals

– Vietnam Service Medal with 3 Bronze Stars

– National Defense Service Medal

– Republic of Vietnam Campaign Medal

– Navy Unit Commendation Ribbon

He was honorably discharged.

Joe then went work at Wawa until he started his Welding Apprenticeship at Sun Ship he then continued his career at Phoenix Steel and SEPTA. After many years of working in all kinds of weather he went on to become a Maintenance Supervisor at SEPTA until he retired in 2009.

While working he always found time to support his children in sports and various activities from dance school, archery, baseball and many more. He coached the softball team for his daughter’s as well as sat on the Town Council for Trainer Pa.

During his retirement he enjoyed spending time with family and friends but let’s be honest he really enjoyed spending time with the lights of his world Jaclyn, Jenna and Jodi and spoiling them.. He also enjoyed camping at their place in Maryland, watching TV especially wrestling and always playing Solitaire on his phone.

We would like to thank the wonderful nursing staff at Riddle’s ICU Unit especially Erin, Lauren, Ben and Sue. Who treated Joe and his family so wonderfully and did everything they could for Joe.

Joe is predeceased by his parents Joseph and Ida Cassidy Sr and his daughter Laurie Cassidy.

He is survived by his wife of 50 years Helen Cassidy of Trainer Pa, his daughter Sharyn (Joe) Novak of Maryland, his son Brian (Jennifer) Cassidy of Trainer Pa, his granddaughters and grandchildren by love Jaclyn (Chris) Novak, Jenna (Cameron) Novak, Jodi (Alystair) Novak and Natalia. His brother Robert (Michele) Cassidy of Concord Township, his sister Mary Cassidy of Upper Chichester and many Nieces and Nephews.

In lieu of flowers we know Joe would love for donations to go to Plumpton Park Zoo in Rising Sun Maryland where his granddaughter Jenna was just hired as a Zoo Keeper. Plumpton Park Zoo

He was always so proud of all 3 girls and would always do whatever he could to help them or their causes.
